attributes.action: Abandon plans to build an Eco Town in Elsenham & Henham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government plans to build 3 million houses by 2020,and have resulted in a 'Eco Town' proposal between Elsenham & Henham close to Stansted airport essex,for 5,000 houses on Greenfield site, as are many others around the country - which is not 'eco.' None are supported by local people. We demand the Government abandon this non-eco plan and re-think the entire policy, in consultation with local people.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abandon plans to build an Eco Town in Elsenham & Henham."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19782


Prime Minister's Office
